props.name: data
props.description: The data of the list, with an id prop as unique identifier.

props.name: onOrderChange
props.description: A callback to get the new order (or swapped items).

props.name: enableHaptic
props.description:
Whether to enable the haptic feedback.
(please note that react-native-haptic-feedback does not support the specific haptic type on Android starting on an unknown version, you can use 1.8.2 for it to work properly)
